divs: sighting detailsi was sitting outside observing the full moon rising up just over my home,when i noticed a bright light.it was about the size of a quarter if held at arms length.bright star like moving slowly north\north east,there were clouds moving through but mostly clear.i observed this for maybe about 2 min as it got further away it just dissapeared.it made no sound as it passed over and had no blinking lights,just a solid bright star like object.i thought maybe it was a weather balloon but this was just way to bright it seemed.i have observed these before but never so close as this was and what really got me is that it just dissapeared right before my eyes.
